dmca.title: [EV1-C1393125F] Notification of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Monday, October 16, 2006 5:28 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1393125F] Notification of Copyright Infringement Subject: [EV1-C1393125F] Notification of Copyright Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Notification of Copyright Infringement Added by system at Monday, Oct 16 2006 09:27 pm X-MailFrom: abuse@fleenerwebhost.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.110] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Oct 16 22:26:01 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 16 Oct 2006 22:23:09 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 16 Oct 2006 22:23:09 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse@fleenerwebhost.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GZfXo-0005hK-St; Mon, 16 Oct 2006 22:23:08 -0500 Received: from [72.232.76.194] (helo=detroit.dnsdc4.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse@fleenerwebhost.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GZfXn-000Es3-26; Mon, 16 Oct 2006 22:23:07 -0500 Received: from ppp-69-229-8-44.dsl.irvnca.pacbell.net ([69.229.8.44]:1843 helo=e0k2g9) by detroit.dnsdc4.com with smtp (Exim 4.52) id 1GZfXo-0005Uq-J2; Mon, 16 Oct 2006 22:23:08 -0500 Message-ID: <006701c6f19c$82239500$2c08e545@domainnotset.invalid> From: "FWH Abuse Center" To: Cc: Subject: Notification of Copyright Infringement Date: Mon, 16 Oct 2006 20:06:28 -0700 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0048_01C6F15E.90A83380" X-Priority: 1 X-MSMail-Priority: High X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2800.1409 Disposition-Notification-To: "FWH Abuse Center" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1409 X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - detroit.dnsdc4.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [0 0] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - fleenerwebhost.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 72.232.76.194 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of fleenerwebhost.com) client-ip=72.232.76.194; envelope-from=abuse@fleenerwebhost.com; helo=detroit.dnsdc4.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 17 Oct 2006 03:23:09.0538 (UTC) FILETIME=[91D2E420:01C6F19B] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Notification of Copyright Infringement Date: October 16, 2006 To Whom It May Concern:, I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of Fleener Web Hosting who own exclusive rights to all textual portions of the About Us located http://www.fleenerwebhost.com/aboutus.html. We have not authorized the use of our About Us text at this location: http://www.passage2web.com/aboutus.htm Please suspend/remove the GUI and files and prevent future abuse. Please review the following page which highlights the exact textual portions copied from our About Us site: http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=6132&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.passage2web. com%2Faboutus.htm&t=1161052679&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.fleenerwebhost.com%2Fa boutus.html&w=25&c= Formality: I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, and with said exclusive owners being named: Fleener Web Hosting 6742 Western Ave., Suite 14 Buena Park, CA 90621 United States I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed are not authorized by the above intellectual property owners, their agents, or the law and therefore infringes their rights. I further aver the information contained in this notice is accurate. I may be contacted at: Bobby Fleener 6742 Western Ave., Suite 14 Buena Park, California 90621 Email: abuse@fleenerwebhost.com Regards, Bobby Fleener Owner Fleener Enterprises DBA Fleener Web Hosting http://www.fleenerentp.com http://www.fleenerwebhost.com MIME element (text/html)
